00001 namespace hdstl{
00002 namespace concepts{
00048    template <class HDS> 
00049    struct MutableHDSConcept {
00051 
00055       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
00056       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::traversal_category traversal_category;
00058 
00062       void constraints() {
00063          using namespace boost;
00064          function_requires<HDSConcept<HDS> >();
00065 
00066          set_opposite(hds,h1,h2);
00067          h = new_edge(h1,h2);
00068          delete_edge(h);
00069          const_constraints(hds);
00070       }
00071 
00075       void const_constraints(HDS const& hds) {
00076          set_opposite(hds,h1,h2);
00077          h = new_edge(h1,h2);
00078          delete_edge(h);
00079       }
00081       MutableHDS hds;
00082       halfedge_descriptor h;
00083       halfedge_descriptor h1;
00084       halfedge_descriptor h2;
00086    };
00087 }} //namespaces
